Uses of Package
com.compendium.ui.toolbars.system

Packages that use com.compendium.ui.toolbars.system
com.compendium.ui.toolbars   
com.compendium.ui.toolbars.system   
 

Classes in com.compendium.ui.toolbars.system used by com.compendium.ui.toolbars
IUIToolBarManager
          This interface contains the required methods to be supported by any class wishing to be a UIToolBarManager
UIToolBar
          This class extends JToolbar to hold some extra information for Compendium's toolbar system and to override some basic behaviours like drag/drop floatability.
UIToolBarController
          This class controls a collection of toolbar panels which can be added and removed from it.
UIToolBarFloater
          UIToolBarFloater defines a dialog to display a floating toolbar in.
 

Classes in com.compendium.ui.toolbars.system used by com.compendium.ui.toolbars.system
DraggableToolBarIcon
          This class create a toolbar icon which can be dragged and copied and which has a String identifier for the drop.
IUIToolBarManager
          This interface contains the required methods to be supported by any class wishing to be a UIToolBarManager
UIToolBar
          This class extends JToolbar to hold some extra information for Compendium's toolbar system and to override some basic behaviours like drag/drop floatability.
UIToolBarController
          This class controls a collection of toolbar panels which can be added and removed from it.
UIToolBarControllerRow
          This class controls a collection of toolbar panels which can be added and removed from it.
UIToolBarFloater
          UIToolBarFloater defines a dialog to display a floating toolbar in.
UIToolBarPanel
          This class manages the toolbars placed in it.
